title: Reinventing reimbursement for pet health insurance
summary:
Barkibu is one of Europe's fastest-growing pet health insurance providers. With a card-based insurance program by Visa and Stripe Issuing, Barkibu helps make quality animal healthcare more accessible for their customers by eliminating the traditional reimbursement model—so pet owners no longer have to pay up front and wait for reimbursement.

Learn more about Barkibu: https://stripe.com/customers/barkibu
